briefTitle: Study of Paliperidone ER in Adolescents and Young Adults With Autism
officialTitle: A Prospective, Open-Label Study of Paliperidone ER in Adolescents and Young Adults With Autism
summary: This 8-week, prospective open-label study will investigate the effectiveness and tolerability of paliperidone ER in adolescents and young adults with autism. Hypothesis:Paliperidone Er will be well tolerated and efficacious for reducing aggression, self-injury, and irritability in adolescents and young adults.
